pages.text: $(br)Although very hot, Venus proves that the Nether is not simply a dimension but an actual place in our universe. There is clear evidence, fauna and flora alike, that proves that the roots of the Nether have originated from someplace else.

$(br2)Maybe one day, Venus will reveal that the Nether is a parasitic or fungal entity that spreads from one planet to the next or that Venus was already Netherfide. The biomes have died out, leaving pockets of material and a bit of civilization as proof that the Nether once resided there.
